app.title: TuPDF
app.subtitle: Modern PDF organization, splitting, and merging tool

darkMode.label: Dark Mode
darkMode.helper: Use dark theme for better viewing in low light

encrypted.title: Encrypted PDFs
encrypted.helper: If you're working with password-protected PDFs, enter the password here. It will be used to decrypt files during processing.

password.label: PDF Password
password.helpText: This password will be stored locally and used for all encrypted PDFs

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.subtitle: We'd love to hear your thoughts, suggestions, or issues!
feedback.name: Name (optional)

errors.failed: Failed to send feedback. Please try again.
errors.network: Failed to send feedback. Please check your connection.

errors.mergeFailed: Failed to merge PDFs. Please try again.
errors.splitFailed: Failed to split PDF. Please try again.
errors.optimizeFailed: Failed to optimize PDF. Please try again.

recent.title: Recent Files
recent.subtitle: View and manage your recently processed PDF files
recent.empty: No recent files found. Start by processing a PDF using Split, Merge, Organize, or Convert features.

merge.needTwo: Please upload at least 2 PDF files to merge

merge.title: Merge PDFs
merge.subtitle: Combine multiple PDF files into one document
merge.successBody: Your merged PDF has been downloaded to your device
merge.filesHelp: Drag to reorder or use the arrows. Files will be merged in this order.

split.title: Split PDF
split.subtitle: Extract pages or split your PDF into multiple files
split.successBody: Your PDF files have been downloaded to your device

organize.title: Organize Pages
organize.subtitle: Reorder, delete, or rearrange pages from your PDF
organize.info: Drag pages to reorder them or click the delete button to remove pages. Changes will be saved when you click "Save PDF".
organize.successBody: Your organized PDF has been downloaded to your device

convert.title: PDF to Images
convert.subtitle: Convert PDF pages to high-quality images

errors.noDoc: PDF document not available. Please reload the PDF.
errors.convertFail: Failed to convert PDF pages to images

convert.convertingBody: Please wait while we process your PDF pages
convert.successZip: All images have been packaged in a ZIP file and downloaded.

optimize.title: Optimize PDF
optimize.subtitle: Reduce file size while maintaining quality
optimize.info: Choose the optimization level. Lower quality means smaller file size but may reduce image quality.

low.title: Maximum Compression
low.desc: Smallest file size - Best for sharing and web use

medium.title: Balanced
medium.desc: Good balance between size and quality

optimize.successBody: Your optimized PDF has been downloaded

loading.title: Loading PDF...
loading.caption: This may take a moment for large files

errors.encrypted: Go to Settings to configure a password for encrypted PDFs, or try a different file.
errors.size: Try compressing the PDF first using the Optimize feature, or use a smaller file.
errors.corrupted: The file may be corrupted. Try opening it in a PDF viewer first, or use a different file.

extract.title: Extract Pages
extract.desc: Extract selected pages into a single new PDF file

ranges.title: Split Selected
ranges.desc: Split each selected page into a separate PDF file

every.title: Split All Pages
every.desc: Split every page into a separate PDF file
